text: Hagi Hezekaia'ma kinima mani'nea knafima fore'ma hu'nea zantamine, agrama mago'azama hu'nea zamofo agenkene, tiru'ma henkaniteno mopama kafino agu'afima tima avreno Jerusalemi rankumapima e'nea zamofo agenkenena, ana maka Juda vahe kini vahe'mokizmi zamagenkema krenentaza avontafepi krente'naze.
